adDetails: CLEANED in ALL ROOMS Ceiling Fans, Light Fixtures, Baseboards, Cob Webs and Windows/Window Sills will be cleaned through out the house. All the woodwork through the house including Doors, Door Frames will be wiped down. All of this and what's below will be INCLUDED in your FLAT RATE PRICE listed on the 1st page. MOVE OUT/IN SERVICE -- Deep Cleaning Bedrooms Bedrooms are to be Swept and Mopped or Vacuum. Closets and Windows/Window sills cleaned in all rooms. Baseboards wipe down Kitchen Microwave, Stove & Cabinets cleaned Inside/Out.(drip pans cleaned also). Windows/Window Sills cleaned. Countertops,Faucets cleaned Santaized & Disinfected. Floor Swept & Mopped Bathrooms Clean Toilets,Tub,Shower and Cabinets Inside/Out. Wipe down Baseboards and Clean Windows/Window Sills. Clean all Mirrors, Faucets = Sweep & Mop Floors Living & Family Rooms Floors are to be Swept and Mopped or Vacuum. Closets cleaned ========= GARAGE SWEPT CLEAN of DIRT Special Request Cleaning --- Can be done for an Extra Fee We are prepared to work until the job is complete ... FLAT RATE PRICES v v As a result, a high percentage of our business is from repeat customers and referrals. Our Cleaning Services is based on the belief that our customers' needs are of the utmost importance. Our entire team is committed to meeting those needs.
